tagsShowOnCreate.granite:comment: Handled by a custom POST servlet for the Create Page case
tagsShowOnCreate.name: ./cq:tags

allowedtemplates.fieldDescription: Click 'Add Field' to add a template or a list of templates to be allowed as child pages. Each value in the list must be an absolute path to a template or use '/.*' to allow all templates below this path.

variantpath.fieldDescription: Choose the social media variation of experience fragment to be used for generating page meta data for social media.
variantpath.name: ./variantPath

ambits.groupQuicktip: Select a brand to specify a scope for targeting. If not specified the default will be used.
ambits.name: ./cq:target-ambits
ambits.serviceQuicktip: An Area refers to a scope of targeting data whereas 'Master Area' is the default scope.

text.text: The Live Copy has been suspended. No action will be performed on a roll out.

deepinheritance.fieldDescription: If checked Live Copy configuration is effective on all children
deepinheritance.name: msm:isDeep
